ProjectTitle: Connected speech as an expression of brain health
InitialFeedbackHistory: 10/05/2023 [REDACTED] DMP for a C1 project should use the BOF-IOF DMP template using dmponline: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp [REDACTED] the content of your current DMP is already good, you'll notice that the template asks for information on further topics, such as documentation/metadata for your datasets; and more details on archiving and data sharing. [REDACTED] the ethics / gdpr approval numbers should be included. 14/06/2022 [REDACTED] DMP for a C1 project should use the [REDACTED] [REDACTED] DMP template in KULeuven DMPonline: https://dmponline.kuleuven.be .
